channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Commerce Cloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Commerce Cloud

item.title: CVE-2021-21445|2024-08-03T18:16:22.329Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20commerce%20cloud
item.description: SAP Commerce Cloud, versions - 1808, 1811, 1905, 2005, 2011, allows an authenticated attacker to include invalidated data in the HTTP response Content Type header, due to improper input validation, and sent to a Web user. A successful exploitation of this vulnerability may lead to advanced attacks, including cross-site scripting and page hijacking.
